content.json: ## Top mission critical computers with CVSS hits >= 9.0

content.query:
TaniumComplyVulnerabilities_CL 
| join TaniumMainAsset_CL on Computer_Name_s| where CVSS_Score_s startswith "9"
| extend Host_0_HostName = Computer_Name_s
| extend Malware_0_Name = CVE_s
| extend IP_0_Address = IP_Address_s
| summarize count() by Computer_Name_s | limit 4
| sort by count_

content.json: ## Top operating systems with CVSS hits >= 9.0

content.query:
TaniumComplyVulnerabilities_CL 
| join TaniumMainAsset_CL on Computer_Name_s| where CVSS_Score_s startswith "9"
| extend Host_0_HostName = Computer_Name_s
| extend Malware_0_Name = CVE_s
| extend IP_0_Address = IP_Address_s
| summarize count() by Operating_System_Generation_s
| sort by count_

TaniumComplyVulnerabilities_CL
|distinct CVE_Year_s,Computer_Name_s, CVE_s
|summarize count() by CVE_Year_s
|render barchart  
|sort by CVE_Year_s asc

TaniumComplyVulnerabilities_CL
|distinct CVE_s, Computer_Name_s, Operating_System_Generation_s
|summarize count() by Operating_System_Generation_s
|render barchart

TaniumComplyVulnerabilities_CL
|distinct CVE_s,Severity_s
|summarize count() by Severity_s

content.json: ## System Outliers (Based on CVE Count & Aggregate CVSS Score)

content.query:
TaniumComplyVulnerabilities_CL
|join kind=inner TaniumMainAsset_CL on Computer_Name_s
|distinct CVE_s,Computer_Name_s,CVSS_Score_s, Operating_System_Generation_s
|summarize  CVECount=dcount(CVE_s), cvss_endpoint_score=sum(todecimal(CVSS_Score_s)) by Computer_Name_s, Operating_System_Generation_s
|project cvss_endpoint_score, CVECount, Computer_Name_s, Operating_System_Generation_s
|render scatterchart
|sort by cvss_endpoint_score asc

TaniumComplyCompliance_CL | where  Rule_ID_s <> ""
|summarize  Total=count(), Pass=countif(Status_Category_s has "Pass"), Fail=countif(Status_Category_s has "Fail")
|extend PassRate=(Pass*1.0/Total)*100
|project PassRate

TaniumComplyCompliance_CL 
|where  Rule_ID_s <> "" and Status_Category_s has "fail"
|summarize Count=count() by RuleID=Rule_ID_s
|top 10 by Count

TaniumDiscoverUnmanagedAssets_CL
|where Os_s <> "" 
|distinct MacAddress_s,Os_s
|summarize count() by Os_s

TaniumDiscoverUnmanagedAssets_CL
|where MacOrganization_s <> "" 
|distinct MacAddress_s,MacOrganization_s
|summarize count() by MacOrganization_s

TaniumDiscoverUnmanagedAssets_CL
|where Ports_s <> "" 
|distinct MacAddress_s,Ports_s
|summarize count() by Ports_s

TaniumDiscoverUnmanagedAssets_CL
| where HostName_s <> ""
| project Hostname=HostName_s, MacAddres=MacAddress_s, IPAddress, MacOrganization=MacOrganization_s, LastDiscoveredTime=LastDiscoveredAt_s
| sort by LastDiscoveredTime

TaniumThreatResponse_CL
|project Computer_Name_s,Timestamp_t,Intel_Name_s
|summarize count () by Timestamp_t, Intel_Name_s
|render areachart

TaniumThreatResponse_CL
| summarize Count=count() by Intel_Name_s
| render piechart
content.title: Threat Response Intel Names (last 30 days)

content.query:
TaniumThreatResponse_CL
| summarize count() by Intel_Type_s
| render piechart
content.title: Threat Response Alert Types (last 30 days)

content.query:
TaniumThreatResponse_CL
| summarize count() by Match_Details_match_properties_user_s
| render piechart
content.title: Threat Response Alerts by User (last 30 days)

items.name: Threat Response Alerts by User (last 30 days)

content.query:
TaniumThreatResponse_CL
| where isnotempty(Match_Details_match_properties_name_s)
| extend ActingProcessName = Match_Details_match_properties_name_s
| summarize event_count=count() by bin(Timestamp_t, 7d), ActingProcessName
| top 20 by event_count
| render barchart

TaniumThreatResponse_CL
|summarize count() by Computer_Name_s, Intel_Name_s
|project-rename Computer_Name=Computer_Name_s, Intel_Name=Intel_Name_s, Count=count_
|sort by Count

TaniumHighUptime_CL
|project TimeGenerated, Computer_Name_s,Reboot_Required_s
|where Reboot_Required_s contains "Yes"
|summarize Count = count() by TimeGenerated

TaniumHighUptime_CL
|where High_Uptime_s !in ("Less than 30", "N/A")
|extend Days=split(High_Uptime_s," ",0)
|project Computer_Name=Computer_Name_s,toint(Days=Days[0]),TimeGenerated
|summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Days, Computer_Name) by Computer_Name
|project TimeGenerated,Computer_Name,Days
|order by Days

TaniumPatchListCompliance_CL
|where Patch_List_Name_s == "All Patches"
|summarize count () by Compliance_Status_s
|render piechart

TaniumPatchListApplicability_CL
|where Superseded_s has "False" and Install_Status_s has "Not Installed"
|summarize count() by Severity_s
|render piechart

TaniumPatchListApplicability_CL
|where Superseded_s has "false"
|summarize count() by Install_Status_s,Severity_s

TaniumPatchListApplicability_CL
|distinct Title_s,Install_Status_s,Severity_s,Release_Date_s
|where Install_Status_s has "Not Installed"
|where Severity_s in ("Critical", "Important")
|extend Year=(split(Release_Date_s,"/",2))
|summarize count() by Year=tostring(Year[0])

TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| summarize by Microsoft_Defender_Installed_s, Computer_ID_s
| summarize Count = count() by Microsoft_Defender_Installed_s
| render piechart
content.title: Installed

content.query:
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| extend // booleans
    Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Installed_s),
    Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_s)
| where Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b
| extend Microsoft_Defender_Health=case(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b, "Healthy", Microsoft_Defender_Health_Issues_s)
| summarize by Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b, Microsoft_Defender_Health, Computer_ID_s
| summarize Count = count() by Microsoft_Defender_Health
| render piechart
content.title: Health Statuses
content.noDataMessage: Unable to query for agent health: is Tanium Connect sending data?

content.query:
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| where Microsoft_Defender_Installed_s == "{defenderInstalled}"
| extend Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_s)
| extend Microsoft_Defender_Health=case(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b, "Healthy", Microsoft_Defender_Health_Issues_s)
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Computer_Name=Computer_Name_s,
    IP_Addresses=replace_string(IP_Address_s, "\\n", ", "),
    Microsoft_Defender_Installed=Microsoft_Defender_Installed_s,
    Microsoft_Defender_Health,
    AntiMalware_Product_Version=Microsoft_Defender_AntiMalware_Product_Version_s,
    AntiMalware_Engine_Version=Microsoft_Defender_AntiMalware_Engine_Version_s,
    AntiSpyware_Signature_Version=Microsoft_Defender_AntiSpyware_Signature_Version_s,
    QuickScan_Signature_Version=Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Signature_Version_s

content.query:
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| where not(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Age_s contains "N/A")
| extend
    Microsoft_Defender_AntiMalware_Service_Enabled_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_AntiMalware_Service_Enabled_s),
    Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Overdue_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Overdue_s)
| where Microsoft_Defender_AntiMalware_Service_Enabled_b
| extend QuickScan_Status=case(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Overdue_b, "Overdue", "Current")
| summarize by QuickScan_Status, Computer_ID_s
| summarize Count=count() by QuickScan_Status
| render piechart
content.title: QuickScan Status
content.noDataMessage: No endpoints found with overdue QuickScans

content.query:
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| where Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Signature_Version_s != ""
| summarize by Signature_Version=Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Signature_Version_s, Computer_ID_s
| summarize Count=count() by Signature_Version
| order by Signature_Version asc
content.title: QuickScan Signature Versions

content.query:
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| where not(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Age_s contains "N/A")
| extend
    Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_s),
    Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Overdue_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Overdue_s),
    Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Age_d=todouble(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Age_s)
| extend Microsoft_Defender_Health=case(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b, "Healthy", Microsoft_Defender_Health_Issues_s)
| extend QuickScan_Status=case(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Overdue_b, "Overdue", "Current")
| extend QuickScan_Age=strcat(trim(".0", tostring(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Age_d)), " days")
| where QuickScan_Status == "{QuickScan_Status}"
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Computer_Name=Computer_Name_s,
    IP_Addresses=replace_string(IP_Address_s, "\\n", ", "),
    QuickScan_Status,
    QuickScan_Age,
    QuickScan_Signature_Version=Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Signature_Version_s
content.title: QuickScan Status Query

content.query:
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL

| extend
    Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_s),
    Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Overdue_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Overdue_s),

| extend QuickScan_Age=strcat(trim(".0", tostring(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Age_d)), " days")
| where Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Signature_Version_s == "{QuickScan_Signature_Version}"
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Computer_Name=Computer_Name_s,
    IP_Addresses=replace_string(IP_Address_s, "\\n", ", "),
    QuickScan_Status,
    QuickScan_Age,
    QuickScan_Signature_Version=Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Signature_Version_s

    Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Age_d=todouble(Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Age_s)

    Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_s),
    Microsoft_Defender_AntiSpyware_Signature_Age_Days_d=todouble(Microsoft_Defender_AntiSpyware_Signature_Days_Age_s)

content.title: AntiSpyware Signature Age Query

content.query:
let tbin=1d;
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| extend
    Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Installed_s),
    Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_s)
| where Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b
| extend Microsoft_Defender_Health=case(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b, "Healthy", Microsoft_Defender_Health_Issues_s)
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, tbin), Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b, Microsoft_Defender_Health, Computer_ID_s
| summarize Count = count() by format_datetime(bin(TimeGenerated, tbin), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), Microsoft_Defender_Health
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| render barchart
content.title: Microsoft Defender Health by Date

content.query:
let tbin=1d;
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| extend
    Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Installed_s)
| where Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b == true and OS_Platform_s == "Windows"
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, tbin), Microsoft_Defender_AntiMalware_Engine_Version_s, Computer_ID_s
| summarize Count = count() by format_datetime(bin(TimeGenerated, tbin), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), Microsoft_Defender_AntiMalware_Engine_Version_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| render barchart
content.title: AntiMalware Engine Versions by Date

content.query:
let tbin=1d;
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| extend
    Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Installed_s),
    Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_s)
| where Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b
| extend Microsoft_Defender_Health=case(Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b, "Healthy", Microsoft_Defender_Health_Issues_s)
| where Microsoft_Defender_Health == "{defender_health_by_date}"
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, tbin), Microsoft_Defender_Healthy_b, Microsoft_Defender_Health, Computer_Name_s, Computer_ID_s
| summarize Count = count() by format_datetime(bin(TimeGenerated, tbin), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), Microsoft_Defender_Health, Computer_Name=Computer_Name_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Microsoft Defender Health Query

content.query:
let tbin=1d;
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| extend
    Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Installed_s)
| where Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b == true and OS_Platform_s == "Windows"
| where Microsoft_Defender_AntiMalware_Engine_Version_s == "{defender_antimalware_engine_version_by_date}"
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, tbin), Microsoft_Defender_AntiMalware_Engine_Version_s, Computer_ID_s, Computer_Name_s
| summarize Count = count() by format_datetime(bin(TimeGenerated, tbin), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), Microsoft_Defender_AntiMalware_Engine_Version_s, Computer_Name=Computer_Name_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Microsoft Defender Antimalware Engine Version Query

content.query:
let tbin=1d;
let signature_version=iff("{defender_quickscan_signature_version_by_date}" == "<empty>", "", "{defender_quickscan_signature_version_by_date}");
TaniumMicrosoftDefenderHealth_CL
| extend
    Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b=tobool(Microsoft_Defender_Installed_s)
| where Microsoft_Defender_Installed_b == true and OS_Platform_s == "Windows"
| where Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Signature_Version_s == signature_version
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, tbin), Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Signature_Version_s, Computer_ID_s, Computer_Name_s
| summarize AntiMalware_QuickScan_Signature_Version_Count = count() by format_datetime(bin(TimeGenerated, tbin), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), Microsoft_Defender_QuickScan_Signature_Version_s, Computer_Name=Computer_Name_s
| order by TimeGenerated asc
